menu.name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Butter
menu.description: Fresh Atlantic salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with a zesty lemon butter sauce and seasonal vegetables.

menu.name: Mushroom Risotto
menu.description: Creamy Arborio rice slowly cooked with a medley of wild mushrooms, finished with Parmesan cheese and truffle oil.

menu.name: Beef Tenderloin Steak
menu.description: Prime cut beef tenderloin cooked to your liking, accompanied by roasted potatoes and red wine reduction sauce.

menu.name: Vegetarian Buddha Bowl
menu.description: A wholesome bowl filled with quinoa, roasted chickpeas, avocado, mixed greens, and tahini dressing.

menu.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menu.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with pancetta, egg, hard cheese, and pepper.

menu.name: Thai Green Curry
menu.description: Aromatic green curry with your choice of chicken or tofu, bamboo shoots, and Thai eggplant, served with jasmine rice.

menu.name: Caesar Salad
menu.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, garlic croutons, and shaved Parmesan cheese, tossed in our homemade Caesar dressing.

menu.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
menu.description: Decadent chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream and fresh berries.
